title: Kate Wright says she is not as confident as she seems and she 'binges on treats'
text:

She seems to ooze confidence and regularly shows off her stunning curves in photos on Instagram .

But according to newlywed Kate Wright she sometimes feels "rubbish' about herself and raids the treat cupboard.

The former TOWIE star, who married ex-footballer Rio Ferdinand this month, told MailOnline that she's not as confident as she appears.

She said: "In all honesty, I am not as confident as I probably appear.

(Image: Instagram)

"I have days like every girl when I feel rubbish about myself and literally eat everything in my treat cupboard!

"But then there are days when I feel really good and that’s probably when you will see an outfit post on Instagram!''

The 28-year-old has a gruelling workout routine and said the secret to keeping a healthy mind and body is exercise.

"I guess outer confidence definitely comes from the inside and I exercise is my therapy for sure, " she said.

Kate even went to the gym hours before she married Rio in Turkey.

Showing videos of herself working out, saying: "Lots of people asking did I train the morning of the wedding .... of course I bl**dy DID.

"It’s not just about the body it’s about the mind ... going into the best day of my life feeling focused and happy."

Kate, who quit the reality TV show to focus on her relationship with Rio and her family, has launched a new Autumn/Winter collection with Very.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She said: "I have had a lot of fashion faux pas over the years and now I just feel a lot more relaxed and chilled in what is in my wardrobe these days.'

"I think as women we tend to pick holes in ourselves all the time, but it’s important in your style to focus on the bits that you love and want to show off, "she said.

"And one of my most favourite things to try and remember is that if you’re always aiming for perfection then you will always be let down so love yourself, flaws and all.
description: The former TOWIE star wed ex-footballer Rio Ferdinand in Turkey earlier this month
